title: Kwan Inn Vegetarian - Boon Lay
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Fast food, Take-out, Catering
description: 观音斋 is at stall 11 of BGain221 Eating House. Serves economic rice, porridge, vermicelli, noodles with readily cooked vegetables. On the menu are laksa, fried hor fun, and chicken rice. Offer Zhi-Char (a la carte) dishes after 4pm.
streetAddress: 221 Boon Lay Place, Boon Lay Shopping Centre Level 1
